messages.title: Julian Sturdy: A record of action. A promise of more.
messages.content: A dedicated local man who understands the problems his area faces and has proved he can work at the highest levels of Government to ensure the best deal for all in York Outer.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Supported £1.5 billion A64 / Hopgrove improvement and Ring Road upgrade projects.
Fighting controversial Local Plan and Labour's threat to build on Greenbelt.
Fought alongside local residents for fairer funding for York's Schools.
Works closely with the National Farmers Union to support the needs of the farming community.

issues.education: Fought alongside local residents for fairer funding for York's Schools.
issues.environment: Supported Ring Road upgrade projects, fighting controversial Local Plan and Labour's threat to build on Greenbelt.
issues.governance: Works at the highest levels of Government to ensure the best deal for all in York Outer.

housing.content: Against development in the Greenbelt, fighting controversial Local Plan and Labour's threat to build on Greenbelt.

leaflet.personalStatement: Julian believes in hard work, integrity and compassion which is reflected in the way he serves York Outer.

politicalExperience.achievements: Supported £1.5 billion A64 / Hopgrove improvement and Ring Road upgrade projects, fought for fairer funding for York's Schools, and works closely with the National Farmers Union.

quotes.text: If re-elected Julian will continue to work tirelessly for his constituents, here are just a few of his key achievements...

images.caption: Photos of Julian Sturdy engaging in various community activities and discussing local issues.
